display_long_description:
FIGHT together against different enemies in the Hex7 Battle Arena.
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.                                                                                                                                                           
[media]
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game a much as you like.
[media]
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
[media]
[media]
[media]
[media]
[media]
[media]
[media]
[media]

DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
